review: everything you need to make replacing strings nice and easy, add a headstand to hold the headstock up and you are set
great little tool to assist you while replacing strings, cleaning or tuning, keeps headstock still and then folds up neatly to fit in a drawer, kit or pocket
get strap for the price, does what it is supposed to do and is comfortable too. glad i purchased it
came in oversized boxes but were packaged securely and easy to set up and hold my guitar and bass right out of the box,
simple, easy to use tuner, awesome price, works on guitars and basses, i am very happy with this product, very portable too
lots of different thicknesses and textures to try out and see what works or like the best, great picks sampler
